name: HumansTxt
description: Allows users to create and manage a humans.txt file directly from Publii's interface.
author: htejera

messageInOptions.text: Configure your humans.txt file settings below.

config.name: includeUpdateDate
config.label: Include Update Date
config.note: Check this box if you want to automatically append the last updated date to your humans.txt file.

config.name: updateDateText
config.label: Update Date Text
config.note: Text to display alongside the last updated date in your humans.txt file.
